tweet: https://t.co/Pw2OAcPIzI  #chainlink quietly releases version 0.3.0.  Mainnet is coming.   $LINK #fintech #smartcontracts #oracles #APIs #crypto #cryptocurrency  https://t.co/4FoO5icUEx

A major problem with Smart Contracts is that they're confined to the limited info on a chain. @Smart_Contract seeks to solve this issue with #ChainLink, which connects Smart Contracts to off-chain applications via web APIs and data streams:  https://t.co/18yoiJ0N6H #blockchain  https://t.co/nSimjInGfO
